name: PaLM-based content creation
shortDescription: This project shows how to create prototypes with MakerSuite and then move them to a real APP using PaML API and Streamlit. The use case for this project is content creation for technical users.
longDescription: This project shows how to create prototypes with MakerSuite and then move them to a real APP using PaML API and Streamlit. The use case for this project is content creation for technical users.
